text: DEADLOCK HANDLING: VICTIM SELECTION Selecting the proper victim depends on a lot of different variables.... — By age (lowest timestamp) — By progress (least/most queries executed) — By the # of items already locked — By the # of txns that we have to rollback with it We also should consider the # of time been restarted in the past to prevent s 2 4 ps 49 39:25/1:1813 -deadlocks ' [ec] QÙ E] [ CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
